item.title: BlackRock Gets Nod to Extend Asia Credit Fund by Another Year
item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: Pursuits https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2026-01-20/blackrock-gets-nod-to-extend-asia-credit-fund-by-another-year (Bloomberg) -- BlackRock Inc. has obtained investor consent to extend the investment period of its second Asia private credit fund, a step forward as it navigates challenges in t...
